job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for an ambitious and skilled Senior Go Engineer to play a key role in the development and delivery of our software products and apps serving over 4m+ users across the globe., As a member of our tech team in Amsterdam, and together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers, you will contribute to the development of innovative solutions that cater to the requirements of our expanding user community. This empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services. Additionally, you will have the responsibility of designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform, ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure.
     * Write production-grade product and platform code.
     * Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
     * Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code.
     * Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.

   Projects you can look forward to:
     * CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool for which customers have already generated over 40+ million images in the last couple of months
     * Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms.
     * Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot.

   And to have a glimpse of some of the amazing stuff we do on the tech side, here is a fresh piece by An Tran, our Head of Engineering about how Creative Fabrica is supporting creators with Generative AI.
job_details.full_text:
Go Engineer

We are looking for an ambitious and skilled Senior Go Engineer to play a key role in the development and delivery of our software products and apps serving over 4m+ users across the globe., As a member of our tech team in Amsterdam, and together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers, you will contribute to the development of innovative solutions that cater to the requirements of our expanding user community. This empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services. Additionally, you will have the responsibility of designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform, ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure.
     * Write production-grade product and platform code.
     * Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
     * Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code.
     * Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.

   Projects you can look forward to:
     * CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool for which customers have already generated over 40+ million images in the last couple of months
     * Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms.
     * Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot.

   And to have a glimpse of some of the amazing stuff we do on the tech side, here is a fresh piece by An Tran, our Head of Engineering about how Creative Fabrica is supporting creators with Generative AI.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on Go programming and traditional software engineering for user-facing applications and infrastructure. While it mentions interacting with an AI-powered platform and a Generative AI tool, the core responsibilities and projects do not align with the specialized tasks of an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

phrases: development and delivery of our software products and apps
contribute to the development of innovative solutions
Write production-grade product and platform code
Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code
Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a focus on building and delivering software applications, including mobile apps and backend systems, which are core to software development.

phrases: serving over 4m+ users across the globe
cater to the requirements of our expanding user community
empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the understanding of user needs, market reach, and the business goal of maximizing user benefit from products and services.

phrases: ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure
job_tasks.justification: This phrase points to the operational aspects of deploying and maintaining systems, focusing on non-functional requirements like scalability, reliability, and security, which are part of MLOps.

soft_skills.justification: The term 'ambitious' suggests a drive for growth and learning, aligning with the need to adapt in a fast-paced tech environment.

phrases: together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers
Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture
soft_skills.justification: These phrases indicate a collaborative work environment and the importance of sharing knowledge and feedback among team members.

phrases: innovative solutions that cater to the requirements
Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on 'innovative solutions', 'iterate fast', and 'data-driven decisions' points to a pragmatic and problem-solving approach.

phrases: play a key role in the development and delivery
Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code
soft_skills.justification: Phrases like 'play a key role' and 'Take responsibility' highlight the expectation of ownership and initiative in the role.
